attributes.title: Horrible oranges
attributes.review: First of all the campaign is horrendous.And I totally fainted once I saw the orange dude pop up my screen  not just that because once I opened the app up it attractive all the oranges of the fruit basket and now I can’t even dare to even eat oranges!! I Can not stand this app

attributes.title: disgusting.
attributes.review: this app is and will always be terrible. when i opened the app my phone smelled and that’s just where it began. i opened it and proceeded to see trumps disgusting orange ass looking face and that made me even sicker. i recommend voting for biden,,, and not getting this app

attributes.title: black lives matter
attributes.review: i absolutely hate this app. when i downloaded it gave my phone multiple viruses. and it actually caused my phone to explode. -16371963829 out of 10. would not recommend to anyone.

attributes.title: Worst experience of my life
attributes.review: The app is nice if it was in hell the app asked me to set my location turn on post notifications and many more the app is the worse app in history I rather play Roblox or scary teacher 3D just delete to make the apple App Store better what is this android just stop delete the app 🤦‍♂️🤮

attributes.title: How dare you cheeto😻🧚🏼👿
attributes.review: Mr. cheeto i saw👁👄👁 your app in the app store💄🦶 and figured i would download it to support our racist sexual assaulter president😍😍👅 This app took 3 weeks to download👣👃🏼 and it crashed as soon as i opened it🦶😹 so n e way basically i’m saying✨😻🧚🏼🏳️‍🌈 your FABULOUS 😝😝 app sucks🍊👁👅👁 This app sent my hamster into shock😻 he is unable to move❤️🎉 i can still hear his screeching to this day😭😭😭 mr. cheeto man your face🏳️‍🌈 scared my hamster💄👄🌚 and now 👄🦶❤️ she is ded✨🧚🏼👅 HOW DO YOU FEEL😭😭😭 YOU MONSTER😭😭 How dare you cheeto💄🎁😻👅

attributes.title: Please help
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to Praise the orange tinted god that rules over the divine country, but while downloading this app I was confronted with things such as racism, misogyny, pedophilia, and an unchecked sense of authority. 0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: This app took 2-weeks to load,not only that but the app didn’t give me information on how to survive the zombie apocalypse now I’m here in my last life with my dog lassie as I’m infected.This is my ghost speaking now this app is the worst thing to mankind.
